BigQuery_query.name: BigQuery_query
BigQuery_query.description: Run a BigQuery query and return the results.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The (multi)region to run the query in. eg. us, us-central1

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The Google Cloud project id to run the query from. Defaults to the GCLOUD_PROJECT environment variable

BigQuery_getTableSchema.name: BigQuery_getTableSchema
BigQuery_getTableSchema.description: Get the schema of a BigQuery table.

parameters.name: tableId
parameters.description: Table id in the format project_id:dataset.table
